dashboard.title: Extension Points Dashboard
dashboard.description: This component displays all available extension points in the Talawa Admin Panel from a global admin perspective, helping developers understand the full ecosystem.
dashboard.clickBelow: Click the button below to test the request system for RA2 extension point.

global.title: Global Plugin Map Dashboard
global.description: This component displays all available extension points in the Talawa Admin Panel from a global user perspective, helping developers understand the full ecosystem.
global.clickBelow: Click the button below to test the request system for RU2 extension point.

organization.title: RA1 - Admin Organization Extension Point
organization.description: This page represents the RA1 extension point - Admin Organization Route. This is an admin organization route that provides admin functionality within a specific organization.
organization.clickBelow: Click the button below to test the request system for RA1 extension point.
organization.redirectError: Organization not found — redirecting to home

user.title: RU1 - User Organization Extension Point
user.description: This page represents the RU1 extension point - User Organization Route. This is a user organization route that provides functionality accessible to member users within a specific organization.
user.clickBelow: Click the button below to test the request system for RU1 extension point.
user.redirectError: Organization not found — redirecting to home

info.globalDesc: This extension point relies on global user context and is available throughout the application for authenticated users.
info.dashboardDesc: This extension point provides administrative capabilities at the global level. Plugins can add widgets and data visualizations here.
info.orgAdminDesc: This extension point provides organization-specific administrative capabilities. Plugins can access organization data and manage features within the current organization context.
info.orgUserDesc: This extension point provides organization-specific features for regular users. Plugins can offer tools and content relevant to the organization members.

injector.paymentDescription: Browse transactions made using the following payment provider
injector.supportText: This location supports component injection via the Plugin Map system. Developers can inject custom components here using the {{id}} extension point.
